title: Clutter
description: This is a storage app built with React and Firebase to serve as a place to store or transfer files or images.  It is complete with full authentication and login functionality.

title: Budgy
description: Budgy is my budget assistant.  He helps me manage my monthly income and expense charts in a neat and interactive way. Powered by Speechly you are able to speak your expenses and income right into existance.

title: AlgoVision
description: Using my classmates' advanced web development understanding and my algorithmic understanding we created this together.  It was fun to be a part of a large scale development project.

title: Bug Squasher
description: This is a Java SpringBoot app built in my software engineering class.  It is made for logging customer complaints and/or bugs.  It is coplete with user authentication and CRUD functionality.

title: GymDolphin
description: MERN stack fitness tracker meant for my freinds and I to track our excercise routinues for a challange we were doing.  Yes it is a knockoff of GymShark.  Full CRUD functionality. Used Insomnia for test-driven development.

title: Weatherman
description: A Progressive Web App or PWA that will return the weather in the most overly efficient way possible.  Fully incorporated with service workers.

title: Quizzy
description: A simple quiz about me, a test of my design and development skills

title: ToDo App
description: A simple favorite.  A ToDo app that tested my design and development skills.
